column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=The last train trip I took was with a couple of friends to go and check out an art museum that was fairly far away .
#text=We met up at the station with plenty of time to spare , so we chatted for a bit while we waited .
#text=We had already purchased our tickets ahead of time , just to make things easier .
#text=When the train arrived , we boarded and found our seats .
#text=We did n't bring much , just small bags , so we did n't have to stow anything .
#text=The conductor came by and checked our tickets as the train left the station .
#text=The train seats are always fairly comfortable and we had time to play racing games on our DSs while we rode .
#text=I also got to watch some rather lovely scenery , once we got out of the city .
#text=Going by trees and landscapes and watching them pass is pretty fun too .
#text=Plus , there were n't that many other people in the train car that we were in , so it was a nice and peaceful ride .
